div.h2: Unified School District #357, Belle Plaine Schools

p.br: The Kansas School Safety hotline is available for use by students, parents, and community members in anonymously reporting any impending school violence. Let’s keep Kansas kids safe!
Children 18 and younger may receive free meals and snacks through the Summer Food Service Program.

hr.p: Find meal locations near you by visiting http://www.fns.usda.gov/summerfoodrocks or by dialing 211 or calling 1-866-3-HUNGRY or 1-866-8-HAMBRE.

p.b: Belle Plaine USD 357 is committed to providing a positive and productive working and learning environment, free from discrimination on the basis of age, sex, race, national origin, religion or disability. If you would like more information you can refer to policies GAAA, GAAC, GAACA, JGEC, and JGECA. They can be found on our district webpage at www.usd357.org, or you can contact the superintendent at (620) 488-2288.

hr.p: The Board of Education is committed to limiting the use of Emergency Safety Interventions (ESI), such as seclusion and restraint, with all students. A copy of policy GAAF, Emergency Safety Interventions, complete with definitions, prohibitions, uses, and notifications can be found in the district's policy manual. A copy of the policy manual can be found on this website. District Policy Manual
